raw_body: At rest with the Lord. Dearly beloved wife of Darrel De Zilva, loving mother of Darine, Darren (deceased), mother-in-law of Shiral Fernando, loving grandmother of Shenal and Shenaya, sister of Hermoine, Louella, Errol and late Evan, Maurice, Veer, Ronald, Bernly, Huxley, Maureen, Louis. The remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour from 10.. a.m. on Thursday 21st March to 3.30 p.m. Friday, 22nd March 2024. Service at 3.30 p.m. followed by
